repairedDockerfile:
FROM armhf/alpine:latest
MAINTAINER alexellis2@gmail.com

WORKDIR /root/
RUN apk add --no-cache --update git python && \
    git clone https://github.com/pimoroni/mote-phat && \
    apk del git
WORKDIR /root/mote-phat/library
RUN apk add --no-cache --update py-setuptools gcc python-dev ca-certificates linux-headers musl-dev libffi-dev && \
    /usr/bin/easy_install-2.7 RPi.GPIO && \
    python setup.py install && \
    apk del gcc  ca-certificates linux-headers musl-dev libffi-dev
WORKDIR /root/mote-phat/examples

CMD ["python2", "./test.py"]
